text: The Girl and the Crocodile () is a 1956 Soviet comedy movie directed by Iosif Gindin and Isaak Menaker.Народная артистка России Наталья Селезнева. БиографияДЕВОЧКА И КРОКОДИЛ It stars Elena Granovskaya, Evgeniy Teterin, and Natalya Polinkovskaya. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 comedy movies Category:1950s family movies Category:Russian family movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies about crocodiles
title: The Girl and the Crocodile
